name: Star Wars: Return of The Jedi - Death Star Battle
name_original: Star Wars: Return of The Jedi - Death Star Battle
description:
Star Wars: Return of The Jedi - Death Star Battle is an action game. It came out on 01-01-1983. Parker Brothers published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Star Wars: Return of The Jedi - Death Star Battle on Atari 2600.
